comment.author: 33514714@N07
comment._content: This  picture  reminds  me  of  an old  Movie--My  Fair  Lady,   the  buzz  and   activity  in  a  morning  market  and    noise  is  also   heard  through this  crowded  street

comment.author: 33165544@N04
comment._content: I grew up in Australia, where many Dutch families had wall hangings of scenes like this. An awesome moment of reminiscence and emotion when I thought of my aunty serving tea and bikkies on a Sunday afternoon, with the wall hanging above us, Delft ornaments on the bookcase, and a black vinyl of Dutch organ music playing.

comment.author: 9537324@N02
comment._content: Translation: street scenes, cheese markets, houses, exterior, chesses, "cheese stretchers", visitors, scales, Alkmaar, Province of North Holland. Undated. By: Willem van de Poll
